body: Cristian Cambronero from Fusil de Chispas [es] updates readers on the crowdfunding initiative for Costa Rican movie "The Return" on Kickstarter: the goal of $40,000 was reached in a little over 5 days, 41 days before the deadline on April 2.
original_body: Cristian Cambronero from Fusil de Chispas [es] updates readers on the crowdfunding initiative for Costa Rican movie "The Return" on Kickstarter: the goal of $40,000 was reached in a little over 5 days, 41 days before the deadline on April 2.
title: Costa Rican Movie "El Regreso" Reaches Funding Goal Through Crowdfunding
